jsonFlow.files.include.description: Glob patterns to include in the package.

jsonFlow.files.exclude.description: Glob patterns to exclude from the package. The default is node_modules, dist, out, build, and any hidden files.

jsonFlow.files.showPath.description: Show the path of the file in the name of the list of generated files

jsonFlow.graph.showValues.description: Show the values of the nodes in the graph

jsonFlow.graph.layoutDirection.description: The direction of the layout of the graph. TB is top to bottom, LR is left to right.
